scripts.build: cd client/apps/app-1 && npm install && npm run build
scripts.mig: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all & npx sequelize-cli db:migrate & npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all
scripts.migseed: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all & npx sequelize-cli db:migrate & npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all & npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.git:merge-dev-into-main: git checkout main && git merge dev && git push origin && git checkout dev
scripts.git:merge-main-into-prod: git checkout prod && git merge main && git push origin && git checkout dev
